scripts.build-deploy: rsync -av --progress ./ ./docs --exclude node_modules/ --exclude .git/ --exclude package-lock.json --exclude package.json --exclude deploy/ --exclude plantilla.html  --exclude scss/ --exclude .gitignore --exclude .DS_Store
scripts.clear-bucket: aws-vault exec andrea -- aws s3 rm s3://jpcueros-s3 --recursive
scripts.upload-bucket: aws-vault exec andrea -- aws s3 cp ./deploy s3://jpcueros-s3 --recursive
scripts.deploy: npm run build-css && npm run clear && npm run build-deploy && npm run clear-bucket && npm run upload-bucket
